conversations.body_text: Hi daryl deschamps,     We apologize for the inconvenience, but we are unable to ship your order. The shipping cost would be an astonishing $311. We will cancel your order, or you may opt to pay the additional $120 shipping fee. We apologize for the inconvenience.

How can I pay the additional $120 and what will the delivery time be?


Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : service@simsonn.com

Why you told additional $80 on your picture ? And told me to pay $120 ?

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : daryl deschamps <ktm37@live.fr>
Envoyé : Friday, December 12, 2025 4:44:45 AM
À : service@simsonn.com

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : daryl deschamps <ktm37@live.fr>
Envoyé : Friday, December 12, 2025 4:48:17 AM
À : service@simsonn.com

Why you told additional $80 on your picture ? And told me to pay $120 ?

How can I pay the additional $ and what will the delivery time be?




Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : service@simsonn.com

Hi daryl deschamps,    We require $80 to cover product costs and shipping fees, but additional expenses are needed to achieve overall profitability. Thank you for your understanding. Estimated delivery time is 7 days.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Hi,

It's ok, i paid the difference

I Hope my order arrive before Christmas

Best Regards




Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : service@simsonn.com

Hi,

Do you ship the parcel ?

Wait for your reply

Best Regards

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
De : daryl deschamps <ktm37@live.fr>
Envoyé : Saturday, December 13, 2025 8:25:24 AM
À : service@simsonn.com

Hi daryl deschamps,    Your order has been shipped. We apologize for sending you the incorrect tracking link. Here is your correct link.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=9672387970&submit=1

Hi,


I received my package and I'm satisfied with it so far. However, during assembly today, I noticed that a U-shaped bracket for the vibrationmotor  is missing, I only had two mounting brackets in the box.

Attached is a photo of what was in the box.
Please tell me how you can provide it.
Sincerely,


Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
